languages.text: "Почему нельзя просто передать власть? К чему кровопролитие?"
"Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"
languages.original_text: "Почему нельзя просто передать власть? К чему кровопролитие?"

traits.locale_text: "Can you not have a simple transition of power? Why must there be bloodshed?"
"Can you not have a simple transition of power? Why must there be bloodshed?"
"Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"
"Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"
"Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"
"Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"

languages.text: « Une simple passation de pouvoir n'est-elle pas envisageable ? Pourquoi faut-il encore que le sang coule ? »
languages.original_text: "Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"

traits.locale_text: « Une simple passation de pouvoir n'est-elle pas envisageable ? Pourquoi faut-il encore que le sang coule ? »

languages.text: «¿No puede haber un cambio de poder de manera más sencilla? ¿Por qué tiene que haber un baño de sangre de por medio?».
languages.original_text: "Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"

traits.locale_text: «¿No puede haber un cambio de poder de manera más sencilla? ¿Por qué tiene que haber un baño de sangre de por medio?».

languages.text: 「単純に権力の移行ではだめなのか？なぜ血を流す必要がある？」
languages.original_text: "Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"

traits.locale_text: 「単純に権力の移行ではだめなのか？なぜ血を流す必要がある？」

languages.text: “你们就不能用正常点的方式进行权力交接吗？为什么非要搞得这么血腥？”
languages.original_text: "Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"

traits.locale_text: “你们就不能用正常点的方式进行权力交接吗？为什么非要搞得这么血腥？”

languages.text: "Ist denn keine Machtübergabe möglich? Warum muss Blut vergossen werden?"
languages.original_text: "Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"

traits.locale_text: "Ist denn keine Machtübergabe mäglich? Warum muss Blut vergossen werden?"

languages.text: "Basit bir güç intikali mümkün değil mi? Neden kan dökülmesi gerekiyor?"
languages.original_text: "Is a simple transition of power not possible? Why must there be bloodshed?"
